title: Hitachi Energy supports a green hydrogen economy to accelerate the energy transition - Hitachi Energy
summary: The article discusses Hitachi Energy's focus on developing green hydrogen solutions for a clean energy transition, including power-to-hydrogen and hydrogen-to-power technologies.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article describes Hitachi Energy's development of innovative products and solutions that contribute to a sustainable energy future and support the clean energy transition.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses Hitachi Energy's introduction of new products and technologies in the green energy sector, such as hydrogen power generators and electrolyser systems.
green_product: FALSE. The article does not provide specific details on a product design or life cycle to evaluate it as a green product.
green_process: TRUE. The article highlights Hitachi Energy's efforts in developing green processes for hydrogen production that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221210 - Natural Gas Distribution, 221222 - Fossil Fuel Electric Power Generation, 221113 - Nuclear Electric Power Generation, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation
greenwashing: FALSE. The article focuses on Hitachi Energy's genuine efforts in developing green energy solutions and technologies, with no indication of false or misleading environmental claims.
